```{r setup, include=FALSE}
knitr::opts_chunk$set(echo = TRUE)
library(tidyverse)
```

Consider the _central polygonal numbers_
$$1, 2, 4, 7, 11, 16, 22, 29, 37, 46, 56, \ldots$$

Find the 100$^\text{th}$ term.

```{r, eval = F, echo = F}
s <- 1
collect <- s
for(i in 1:99) {
  s <- s + i
  collect <- c(collect, s)
}
collect
```
